featured.title: F1 Pit Strategy Predictor LSTM
featured.description: Deep learning system to predict Formula 1 pit stop strategies using real telemetry data. The system predicts when a driver will pit and which tyre compound they will mount, achieving AUC 0.93 for pit timing and 78% accuracy for compound selection.

featured.title: Network Hardening Planner (AI-Based)
featured.description: Automated planning system for network security hardening using AI techniques. Models network infrastructure and generates optimal action plans to close insecure ports while minimizing operational impact.

featured.title: OpenID Connect & Digital Identity
featured.description: Bachelor's thesis on authentication and authorization in OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0, focusing on security mechanisms, token management, and enterprise integration.

all.title: TalentScope AI
all.description: Machine learning classification pipeline using ensemble models with advanced feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning for FIFA 2022 player potential prediction.

all.title: Oracool Web Platform
all.description: Full-stack web application for sports predictions with Laravel backend, MySQL database, and responsive Bootstrap frontend following Agile methodology.

all.title: Data Hiding
all.description: Exploration of steganography techniques using CNNs and GANs for robust hidden information in multimedia files.

all.title: Grid Pathfinding Algorithms
all.description: Implementation of efficient pathfinding algorithms for obstacle-based path computation on grid systems.

all.title: Work Performance Trading
all.description: Java application for automated resource exchange with modular architecture following SOLID principles.

all.title: Electromagnetic Field Analysis
all.description: MATLAB project for quantitative analysis of electromagnetic field exposure from HF antennas and eLF power lines.

all.title: Gurobi Optimization
all.description: Mathematical optimization using Gurobi solver for complex constraint satisfaction and linear programming.

all.title: University Record Book GUI
all.description: Desktop application in Java to manage academic records with Swing-based GUI and JSON data storage.

all.title: Social Media Marketing Project
all.description: Created and managed a social media channel applying marketing strategies and content optimization.
